pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the psychometric properties of the Taiwan Chinese Version of the EORTC QLQ-PR25 health-related quality of life (HRQOL) questionnaire for patients with prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Long-term differences in urinary, bowel and sexual function among men treated with surgery versus radiation for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23665759/
